org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments

Interface ExternalEnvironmentSettings

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JIPipeParameterCollection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessesExtensionSettings, PythonExtensionSettings, RExtensionSettings

    public interface ExternalEnvironmentSettings
extends JIPipeParameterCollection
    A settings page that contains basic settings for all external environments.
